Great movie, Thanks froggie100!
IMPORTANT: I didn't notice before downloading, the video is in 4:3 ratio! 960x720!
It's supposed to be 4:3 !!!! This movie is intended to look and feel like an old silent era movie.  The only thing that is modern is the audio which is in 6 channel surround.
@moshster Check the aspect ratio mentioned on the imdb.com and you'll have your answer.

Just to re-itterate, at the time of posting this is the most popular torrent for this film - readers should not though that the onscreen captions are all in French (with English subtitles). Not a major issue I suppose but I've gone abck and got what (I hope) is the same thing but with English captions. Worth considering before downloading!
